title: Dogs with the most Instagram followers worldwide 2017
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of followers in millions for 10 number of Months.
Month Jiff Pom @Jiffpom has the highest Number of followers in millions and Manny @manny the frenchie has the lowest Number of followers in millions.
The Number of followers in millions of Month Jiff Pom @Jiffpom is 6.6% larger than the minimum value at Manny @manny the frenchie.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Number of followers in millions in each Month on the y axis.
The Number of followers in millions is highest at Month Jiff Pom @Jiffpom and lowest at Month Manny @manny the frenchie.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of followers in millions for 10 number of Months.
Month Jiff Pom @Jiffpom has the highest Number of followers in millions and Manny @manny the frenchie has the lowest Number of followers in millions.
The Number of followers in millions of Month Jiff Pom @Jiffpom is 6.6% larger than the minimum value at Manny @manny the frenchie.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Number of followers in millions in the y axis.
Month Jiff Pom @Jiffpom has the highest Number of followers in millions and Manny @manny the frenchie has the lowest Number of followers in millions.
Month Doug the Pug @itsdougthepug has the second highest value for Number of followers in millions.
The highest value at Month Jiff Pom @Jiffpom is 6.6x times more than the lowest value at Manny @manny the frenchie.

The Month Jiff Pom @Jiffpom has the highest Number of followers in millions, followed by Doug the Pug @itsdougthepug, and Maruto @Marutaro. Down to the Month Manny @manny the frenchie which is the lowest.
Overall Number of followers in millions has declined over the Months.
Month Manny @manny the frenchie, and Loki and Bear @Lokistagram have a similar Number of followers in millions that is 1.0.
The lowest value 1.0 at Manny @manny the frenchie is almost 2.95 times smaller than the average value 2.24.
The Number of followers in millions is 22.4 if we add up values of all Months.
